metadata.title: CVE-2018-19974 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In YARA 3.8.1, bytecode in a specially crafted compiled rule can read uninitialized data from VM scratch memory in libyara/exec.c. This can allow attackers to discover addresses in the real stack (not the YARA virtual stack).

criterions.comment: yara package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
